hi,

i'm trying to use / make samples with the jxunit-framework,
because i have to separate test-data from test-methods.

but jxunit doesn't seems to be used "intuitively" to use ?!
is there anybody using jxuit during a dev-project ?? 

another question : is there anybody who knows if its possible
to use the junit--ant--task to run jxunit-tests ??

thx,
gabi
